name: Faerie Fire
description: The ethereal flames from the ever-burning ruins of Kindertree ignite across realities.

abilities.name: Imbue
abilities.description: Consumes the Faerie Fire and instantly health restores.
notes: Interrupts the wielder's channeling abilities upon cast.
Can be used by Spirit Bear

additionalInfo: When randoming a hero, the hero starts with a free, unsellable Faerie Fire, except in Turbo Mode.
The attack damage from multiple instances fully stacks.
Couriers are able to use Faerie Fire.
